Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Western
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago, then resume their normal route: due to a street blockage near Chicago/Western. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute near 75th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th rr EB via 75th, Stewart, 76th, Lafayette & over normal rte; WB via State, 76th, Stewart, and 75th due to blockage nr 75th/Wentworth

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 75th/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses will operate via 75th, Stewart, 76th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via State, 76th, Stewart, 75th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Racine
ShortDescription: \Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Racine due to a loss of power. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Racine due to a loss of power.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Forest Park to LaSalle to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
